tests:
def test_single_book():
    assert max_books_on_shelf(1, [100], 50) == 0
    assert max_books_on_shelf(1, [30], 30) == 1

def test_multiple_books():
    assert max_books_on_shelf(5, [10, 20, 30, 40, 50], 100) == 4
    assert max_books_on_shelf(3, [15, 5, 10], 30) == 3
    assert max_books_on_shelf(4, [25, 10, 30, 20], 50) == 2

def test_maximum_thickness():
    assert max_books_on_shelf(10, [10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10], 100) == 10
    assert max_books_on_shelf(6, [50, 20, 20, 10, 10, 10], 100) == 5
    
# Running these tests will require the function to be placed into a module named 'solution',
# and then you can run pytest on this file containing the test cases.
